## ColorRGBA64.equalValue() method

Determines if one color is equal to another.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
equalValue(rhs: ColorRGBA64): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rhs | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) | the color to compare |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
